components.description: A square shown in the shade of white. May be used to represent anything white.
components.title: White Large Square

description: A square shown in the shade of white. May be used to represent anything white.
title: White Large Square

version.description: The following characters were amongst those added to Unicode in 2008, the majority of which were given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: White Large Square was approved as part of Unicode 5.1 in 2008 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. Copy and paste this emoji: Copy http://emojipedia.org/white-large-square/
emoji_net_data.name: white large square

bn:00111084a: Forming a right angle, especially at right angles with the mast or the keel, and parallel to the horizon; said of the yards of a square-rigged vessel when they are so braced.
Having four equal sides and four right angles or forming a right angle

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the white large square emoji is a minimalist yet impactful element, presented with Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges, creating a clean and modern aesthetic. Its pure white surface, subtly shaded to suggest depth and form, makes it a versatile building block for visual communication or a symbol of clarity and a fresh start. This emoji on Apple devices can be used to create visual patterns, represent a blank canvas, or signify a pause and reset in a conversation.
